entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.Json Serializer Behavior Changes Depending on Object Interfaces #64302
  • RegexReductionTests are failing in browser #64300
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed '((node->OperGet() == GT_CALL) && (def->OperIsStore() || def->OperIs(GT_PUTARG_STK, GT_NOP, GT_ARGPLACE))) || ((node->OperGet() == GT_JTRUE) && (def->TypeGet() == TYP_VOID) && ((def->gtFlags & GTF_SET_FLAGS) != 0))' during 'Rationalize IR' #64297
    7.0.0
  • Double.ToString(format) not throwing FormatException #64295
  • HostBuilder.CreateServiceProvider() on release 6.0 generates System.ArgumentNullException #64293
  • Invalid format specifier on DateOnly in string interpolation leads to infinite loop instead of FormatException #64292
  • R2RDump crashes when disassembling composite framework due to duplicate key in PGO method map #64291
    7.0.0
  • Identify places where file handles are closed and very soon reopened again #64288
    7.0.0
  • ASP.NET service Segmentation fault in Docker container with .NET 6.0 #64282
  • How do I embed an Info.plist / add arbitrary linker args? #64276
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.SequenceEqualUntil<T> #64271
    7.0.0
  • Getting command line via Diagnostic IPC APIs doesn't work properly in .NET 6 #64270
  • <MonoAOTCompiler/> fails on F# projects due to satellite assemblies #64269
    6.0.MAUI
  • Investigate using Auto layout for structs in the framework #64261
  • Nuget packages not properly restored when ReadyToRun publishing #64260
  • [Perf] Changes at 1/21/2022 9:08:44 PM #64275
  • [Perf] Changes at 1/21/2022 9:08:44 PM #64273
    7.0.0
  • .NET Core app - submission to Mac app store #64258
  • Duplicate assembly macros #64253
  • Bug of Uri #64249
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: RequiredMemberAttribute and NoRequiredMembersAttribute #64248
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\CLR-x86-JIT\\V1-M09.5-PDC\\b27657\\b27657\\b27657.cmd #64246
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT codegen optimization opportunities #64242
    Future

Closed

  • Audit resource string formatting where excess arguments are passed #63607
    7.0.0
  • Switch to primarily using a managed parser for AssemblyName #45032
    7.0.0
  • Consider using Mono.Posix in test code instead of directly P/Invoking to libc #63811
  • Error in CI `Mono llvmfullaot Pri0 Runtime Tests Run Linux arm64 release` #60234
  • Add CancellationToken to StreamReader.Read* methods #20824
    7.0.0
  • API Proposal: Add `ref` field feature support to `RuntimeFeature` class #64165
    7.0.0
  • Improve vectorization of MemoryExtensions.IndexOf(..., span) #60866
    7.0.0
  • ILVerify false error with array covariance and type parameter #63999
    7.0.0
  • system.io.filesystemaclextensionstests failing regularly on Mono #64280
  • PlatformNotSupportedException FileInfo_ReadRights_WithSecurity FileInfo_WriteRights_WithSecurity #64221
  • Add Time value type in System #25816
    Future
  • DOTNET_ROOT does not work as the doc says. #64244
  • `object.GetType` needs to have an exception set #63553
    7.0.0
  • Investigate benefit of computing max regex match length #62697
    7.0.0
  • Performance degradation when using property-init over constructor on record-struct #64257
  • Maybe a bug in Uri class #64245
    7.0.0
  • MemoryMappedFile.CreateNew on macOS throws System.IO.PathTooLongException #63240
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] Always store to allocas in OP_LLVM_OUTARG_VT #64303
    runtime-mono, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Override all `Read` methods in `NullTextReader` and `NullStreamReader` #64301
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix minor typos in GC documentation. #64298
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix arm64/PInvoke so that NESTED_ENTRY/NESTED_END labels match. #64296
    community-contribution
  • [mono] Allow missing assemblies in llvmonly+interp mode. #64294
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono] Avoid inlining the wrappers used by CALLI. #64290
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add attributes for required members #64287
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Update the managed type system to more gracefully fail when calling a varargs method. #64286
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Cancel pending ReadableStream on Dispose #64285
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix profiling objectsallocatedbyclass (#63814) #64284
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.3
  • WIP: CoreCLR runtime tests on Mono Windows x64. #64281
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Move DllImportGenerator to use DisableRuntimeMarshalling for its blittable classification #64279
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [mono] Recognize new names for Xamarin.iOS etc assemblies #64278
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Codespaces] Make it possible to run wasm samples in the browser #64277
    area-Infrastructure
  • Implement TLS1.3 delayed client cert requests on Linux #64268
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • [release/6.0] Make sure that shared memory object name meets the length requiremens #64266
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.3
  • FileSystem.Unix: CopyFile: use copy_file_range on Linux. #64264
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix exception propagation over HW exception frame on macOS arm64 #64262
    Servicing-approved, arch-arm64, os-mac-os-x, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.3
  • make sure failed SSL does not impact other sessions #64256
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Support {Last}IndexOfAny with sets after {lazy} loops #64254
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] make sure OpenSSL is initialized before Tls13Supported code runs #64252
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.3
  • Simplify the creation of diagnostics using DiagnosticId #64250
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix generic method resolution in composite R2R images #64247
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • When decommitting, leaving one instead of two pages in regions case. #64243
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • Add Regex.Count string overloads #64289
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix formatting of resource string where excess arguments are passed #63824
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Improve Regex handling of anchors #64177
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed #62866
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • Add CancellationToken to TextReader.ReadXAsync #61898
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Restrict parallelism in LLVM FullAOT compile, to prevent OOM #63800
    area-Build-mono
  • Catch UnicodeEncodeErrors during printing superpmi logs #64251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-preview1] Ensure that we aren't accidentally generating instructions for unsupported ISAs #64224
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add ref field runtime feature indication #64167
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 7.0.0
  • Only send to Helix for rolling build, due to small Helix queue #64274
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Take ARMv6 out of PlatformGroup All #64267
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Correct JsonNode.Root doc #64238
    documentation, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Skip tests using AsyncIO in FileSystemAclExtensionsTests where it's not supported #64212
    area-System.IO
  • Use lower call count threshold for tiering in debug builds #60945
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add the exception set for `ObjGetType` #64106
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ILVerify] Fix casting check for arrays of generic parameters with class constraints #64259
    area-ILVerification
  • Delete unused ApiCompat baseline files #64190
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #64056
    area-codeflow
  • Fix PAL_wprintf for wide characters #64181
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Make XmlSerializer.Generator targets incremental #64191
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make sure that shared memory object name meets the length requirements #64099
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Update main branding to preview2 #64219
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Avoid deadlock with ConfigurationManager #63816
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 6.0.3
  • BackgroundService doc: improve API documentation #63011
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add UnreachableException #63922
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Clone ADDR(LCL) for DUP #64171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove usage of FEATURE_CORESYSTEM #63850
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ReadyToRun loading on Apple Silicon (.NET 6) #64104
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reverse `ASG(CLS_VAR, ...)` #63957
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • add osr plus stress tests for libraries #64116
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • More cleanups in assembly loader area #63157
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Avoid an assert in ves_icall_RuntimeFieldInfo_SetValueInternal #64214
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Preserve existing keys in dictionary #63834
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • Trying to fix issue #63788: "NetworkChange.NetworkAddressChanged event leaks threads on Linux #63963
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Use generic collections in System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter implementation #63315
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • #51371 fixed failing test in iossimulator #63877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Check for CMAKE_C_COMPILER_ID not CXX #64226
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix unique VNs for `ADDR`s #64230
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Commutative morph optimizations #64122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve `fgValueNumberBlockAssignment` #64110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Stop using `CLS_VAR` for "boxed statics" #63845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interface for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Allow symbols 3 external symbols into the gcc/gcov library. #64236
    community-contribution
  • Change exception throw when ICustomMarshaller applied to field #64183
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Update zip extraction to never throw any exceptions when the LastWriteTime update fails #64192
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 6.0.3
  • Throw during renegotiation if there is incomplete received TLS frame #64066
    area-System.Net.Security
  • gcc compilations for ARM64 can not initialize extern "C" variables. #64239
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Check for CodeSizeZero error before any assumptions about code existing #63239
    area-ILVerification, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix crash when VS4Mac is debugging VS4Mac arm64 #64086
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.3
  • Use stable outputs in illink targets #64160
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated on Linux and OSX #63945
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to Set Next Instruction Pointer. #64114
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support chrome debugging using chrome://inspect #63900
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #63904
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Improve String.Substring performance #62577
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Allow SslStream in ConnectCallback #63851
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Unify reading from procfs to get network related information #63696
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Ensure that canceled Task.Delays invoke continuations asynchronously from Cancel #64217
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, tenet-reliability, 7.0.0
  • fix ping with SendIpHeader on FreeBSD #63531
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd
  • Expand System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat to support the APIs required by Xamarin #64234
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Refactor FileStatus.Unix. #62721
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Serialize SendPacketsAsync tests #63888
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Avoid name collision for covariant and hidden properties (#63443) #63823
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Remove usage of codecvt from corerun #64157
    area-Host, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Options` #63767
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Initial templates implementation #63683
  • Build ILCompiler NuGet packages #63212
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [wasm][debugger] Don't show the wasm functions on callstack when debugging managed code #64223
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Reduce the size of HeaderDescriptor #64105
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix race conditions in SystemEvents shutdown logic #62773
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Fix several bugs in NullabilityInfoContext. #64143
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Inject RegexGeneratorAttribute from the generator #64229
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Console.Unix: fix missing terminal configuration on SIGINT/SIGQUIT/SGCONT. #64200
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed (part 2) #63915
    area-System.Reflection
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Move libunwind directories to src/native/external #64043
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Optimize generic sharing for generic methods. #64129
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add gen folder moving gen projects from src folder #64231
    area-Extensions-Logging
